changeSet.comment: Extra two columns for receipt table

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.comment: Change monetary type from INTEGER to BIGINT

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.sql: CREATE FUNCTION balance(urn VARCHAR(120)) RETURNS BIGINT AS $$ SELECT COALESCE(SUM(a), 0)::BIGINT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN dt = $1 THEN dtbalance ELSE ctbalance END AS a FROM receipt WHERE dt = $1 OR ct = $1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1) AS x $$ LANGUAGE SQL

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.comment: Trigger to update balance on every INSERT into receipt
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER preset_balance_trigger BEFORE INSERT ON receipt FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE preset_balance();

changeSet.author: yegor@tpc2.com
changeSet.comment: Prohibit updates or deletes on RECEIPT table
changeSet.sql: CREATE TRIGGER prohibit_changes BEFORE UPDATE OR DELETE ON receipt FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE prohibited();
